website_summaries.verdict: An ultra protective case that gets tops marks for durability and functionality.
pros: Users give this case high praise for its ability to protect the phone very well, even from ground impact
Gets top marks for fitting the phone well and protecting phones over time
Rugged design is versatile – a top choice for any age
cons: The design is a bit bulkier than the Commuter, and some users report minor issues such as muffled call sound and dust getting under the screen cover

website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for serious protection for your iPhone 7, this popular model offers a superior design, tough materials, and added peace of mind.
pros: One of the toughest designs by a top name in cell phone cases, as it boasts a dual-layer construction with screen protection
Many owners rave about how well it protects from drops and bumps
Features a clip that can also be used as a kickstand
cons: Falls on the higher end of the price scale
Adds some bulk to your phone

customer_reviews.title: Phone run over by a car? Twice? No problem.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to protect your iPhone, this is the way to do it. My special needs son got irritated by a game he was playing and THREW MY PHONE OUT THE WINDOW while I was driving. (No parent shaming please.). I was driving about 40 MPH at the time. In the time it took for me to turn around safely, I saw my phone get run over by 2 cars. While I was cringing, my Otter Box was busy living up to its reputation! My phone doesn’t have even a scratch on it! Everything is working exactly as it should. The only downfall? It’s a little dirty now. Big, huge thanks to OtterBox Defender!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Sugar Pie

customer_reviews.title: Less than 2 months and the whole back is peeling off!
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete piece of garbage. The Touch ID doesn’t work well through the cover, and (almost immediately after the return window ended), the back started peeling. The photo shows how bad the back looks after less than 2 months. The pictures say it all - it is horrible. Had the exact same case for an iPhone 6 and it worked fine for years. There is something very wrong with this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewmaker

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit It’s hard to use the touch screen you ...
customer_reviews.text: Tight fit It’s hard to use the touch screen you really have to push down and the letters on the edge are tricky hard to push down I took the plastic cover off the otter box and used a glass cover screen
customer_reviews.author: Brttchpmn

customer_reviews.title: but the built in screen protector is garbage and renders the phone rather useless
customer_reviews.text: The outside of the case is as-expected, but the built in screen protector is garbage and renders the phone rather useless. There is such a large gap between the protector and the phone that it makes it difficult if not impossible to type anything or press any icons/links on the screen. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Lower

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT fit iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: It is clearly stated in the description that this is made for iPhone 8 but this product does NOT work with iPhone 8. The screen protector built into the defender case does not sit flush on the screen of the iPhone 8.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander K Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have had several OtterBox Defender cases over the years and I have always very happy until this case. The problem with this case is there is a gap between the screen protector on the case and the screen on the phone. This gap makes it extremely difficult to use the phone. I will be sending it back for a replacement case. I'm hoping I just got a dud. I will update my review when I get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: C Neil

customer_reviews.title: BEST Phone Case Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I strongly believe these are the best phone cases out there, PERIOD. I've been using the Otterbox Defender on all of our phones (4 of them) for at least 6 years. We've had the teens use them and my husband and I both used. Not one of us is good with our phones, I'm constantly dropping mine on pavement, cement floors at work, etc. These cases do an amazing job at protecting the phones. The only one flaw to the case that I can say is that the outter rubberish part tends to stretch and not fit the plastic part after a while. While it makes the phone quite bulky and doesn't look the best, it works the best.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Hough

customer_reviews.title: This is the worst designed otter box I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Can't keep debris from under screen for even one day! Screen fills with debris behind case. This is the worst designed otter box I have ever owned! It doesn't fit right to IPhone 7! I have had iPhones with otter box cases for iPhone 5 and 6.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: ... phone cases over the years and this one is terrible. All the camo is coming off the back ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many OtterBox Defender Series phone cases over the years and this one is terrible. All the camo is coming off the back of the back of the case and I received it Oct 19th 2017. I contacted Amazon over a week ago to no avail. I'm not sure if this is just horrible quality or if I paid for an authentic OtterBox and received a counterfeit version. The first pic is the newest one. The second pic is one I had on my iPhone 6 for 2.5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Charity J.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you have iPhone 8
customer_reviews.text: With iPhone 8 there is space between the phone’s touchscreen and the Otterbox screen protector. The space makes typing challenging at best, mostly troublesome. Despite the claim in the ad that the case is compatible with iPhone 8, it really is not unless you never type letters with your smartphone. Very disappointed with what are usually superior, well designed products
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone Protector. Screen protector is worthless.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Iphone 7. Love the sturdy case with the rubber insert. Plugs for cords and pushbuttons in all the right places. My only issue was the included clear plastic cover. The cover is attached to the edges of the case. The problem was the clear cover didn’t quite make complete contact with the phone surface. It became impossible to hit any of the keys on the edge of my phone. My solution?- I cut out the clear cover with a razor blade. I now have a protected phone and complete contact with my phone screen.
customer_reviews.author: Schrocker

customer_reviews.title: They just wear out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Both my husband and I use them on our iPhones, but the outside rubberized covers wear out too quickly and end up not fitting around the hard shell after about 6 months. at this rate we're replacing them every year, which is certainly cheaper than replacing a phone every year, but it would be nice if you could just get a replacement rubberized cover instead of the whole case.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kurz

customer_reviews.title: Best Protection
customer_reviews.text: Got the new i-phone and no question which case to buy. I have had Otterbox Defenders on my last three phones (which all wore out, were never broken) and I have been totally satisfied. I constantly drop my phone and have never had one cracked screen or broken phone while using the Otterbox. Granted, it does take up more space and probably would not fit in a pocket. But my phones have been through some serious abuse and have always been protected. I only wish the colors were more vibrant as I need something bright when I am searching for my phone. The cover goes on easily. I do not use the belt clip, but it is included.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J.

customer_reviews.title: This is " THE " case to buy!
customer_reviews.text: WOW, After searching for the best case and even ordering a bad one, I found the BEST! Ignore any and all bad comments. This Otterbox is the best protection on the market. And, I did not get it free. Being a man 😀 And prone to leave things laying around, I bought the orange case. The case has a solid feel with rubbery edges, it will not slide out of my hand or pocket. All buttons work and I have no idea why anyone would want to add or replace screen protector. Quit looking and don't do the $9.99 mistake.
customer_reviews.author: mrgarlic

customer_reviews.title: Best with a little modification
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case ( for an iPhone 8) after having owned many other defender series otter boxes among other brands and always coming back to the defender. And it is exactly as expected. I did notice that that the screen protector did not sit flush with the screen and made typing annoying more than anything. So, like another reveiwer, I ordered the tempered glass screen protector and started cutting. After I finished cutting the screen protector and adding the tempered glass protector I am extremely satisfied with how it turned out. All the benefits and protection of a defender, and the screen clarity/feel of a naked iPhone. Best of both worlds.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Great case...
customer_reviews.text: A great case. I tried a different brand for a while and was not satisfied so...I returned to Otter Box and am happy again. A word of caution - when pulling open the flap to insert your charging cable, don’t overextend the flap. Doing so will cause the flap to break off after repeated use. As long as you don’t bend it farther than needed to insert your charger, all will be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve personally have always been a fan of otter box cases. My parents always had them as I grew up, so I know they were good. I finally got one of my own, on my own haha. It’s a great case!! It’s built very well and every part of the case is very high quality. The only issue I run into is that the little cover over the home button won’t let my fingerprint scan. Stuff builds up in there easily and then my fingerprint won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fettik

customer_reviews.title: Best cases around
customer_reviews.text: My last 3 phones have been protected by Otterbox. A little more bulky than others but worth it to not worry when my phone gets dropped on my cement garage floor as I’m carrying groceries in. That seems to happen more than it should to me. :)
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Otterbox. I bought my first one after I dropped my iPhone and cracked the glass....even tho it had a sturdy case on it. Since putting the Otterbox on the repaired phone, no more problems. So now I have Otterboxes on my phones. It's a bit bulky, but not annoyingly so. The rubber case make it secure in your hand - no slipping. The plastic faceplate interferes with my fingerprint recognition - the iphone doesn't read it through the plastic and it looks like removing the plastic button cover will leave a mess....but putting in a password only takes a moment. It's worth it for the protection. The black belt-clip feature comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: LightVision

customer_reviews.title: Returned. Poor design makes phone unusable
customer_reviews.text: The case comes with a screen protector which is nothing but a layer or of thick, clear plastic that makes touch screen almost unusable. Yes it also comes with a film that is supposed to protect finger print button and makes that unusable too. The case itself is sturdy (bulky) and could’ve been great if it didn’t make the touch screen and home button unusable. Returned
customer_reviews.author: ryz

customer_reviews.title: Plastic screen cover scratches easy. Better to buy a screen protector and cut ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic screen cover scratches easy. Better to buy a screen protector and cut out the plastic screen protector. Other than that perfect case for phone protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look again
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this product for my IPhone 7 and received it yesterday. Durability is fine, a rugged case; however, the responsiveness of the screen is not adequate.. I have cracked my screen twice in a month and wanted something to amp up the protection. Texting is so painful..you need to pound on it and then it doesn’t respond especially near the edges of the case, backspace, numbers, letters....will be returning it,.....giving my self a few days to see if I can get used to it but wish they would fix the screen protector as the case offers excellent protection.
customer_reviews.author: Pdiddy1951

customer_reviews.title: Best Case, Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Otter box is the most durable case out there. Worth every penny. Been 6 months and absolutely no issues. I have bought 3 Other cases not the last 2 yes with and belt clips, and they all broke within months. Don’t go cheap if you carry your phone on the belt clip every day like me. Just not worth it unless you get an otter box.
customer_reviews.author: B C Berger

customer_reviews.title: Makes the Touch ID fingerprint reader unusable.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Have always loved Otterbox Defender series for previous phones but I got an IPhone 8 and it makes the fingerprinted reader NEVER work. It’s so frustrating. I think I will either have to buy a different case, did a way to peel off this part of the cover, or never use the Touch ID. Sigh. Cannot recommend, sadly.
customer_reviews.author: A. W.

customer_reviews.title: Look at the back of the phone in relation to the window on the phone case.
customer_reviews.text: Well I didn't think to make sure the apple icon was in the middle I'm not sure if I ordered the wrong case or if its not made center on accident only time will tell I got the newest se and the window on the case is not centered like the icon is I'm still going to rock it cuz it fits but in going to get a different case cuz the hole without the logo looks gay.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Once I figured out how to take it apart, it was great!  :)
customer_reviews.text: There weren't very good instructions as to how to get the iPhone case to come apart. Thank God for the internet!! Once I was able to figure out how to do it, everything else was easy. The case fits my iPhone 8 perfectly, and I am having no troubles at all with the plastic screen covering; all the keys and icons are working and accessible just as they were prior to putting the case on. Over all, I am pleased. :)
customer_reviews.author: Karen T.

customer_reviews.title: Love otterbox! Toddler proof!
customer_reviews.text: I love otterbox! I love the product because it keeps my phone safe and toddler proof. She spilled milk on it at a restaurant. I didn’t even worry because even though it’s not completely waterproof, it still kept my phone dry. My toddler has accidentally thrown my phone on ceramic tile before and my phone was fine. The company has improved the design, the quality is great and their customer service is out of this world!
customer_reviews.author: strawberrymomma

customer_reviews.title: Protects the phone if /when you drop it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Ottorbox phone case. The last one lasted several years until the plastic edges cracked and the rubber outer coating started to strech. Only reason not 5 star was I couldn't find my favorite color for my I phone 7. I'm not one to get the lattest device. Sometimes the fingerprint reader doesn't work and I'm assuming it is the plastic cover of the case. It is bulky, not the most stylish, but "it takes a licken and it (the phone) keeps ticken". It you don't recognize the quote ask your parents or grandparents. I haven't dropped it from higher than shirt pocket level but it protects the phone.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorMickey

customer_reviews.title: Awful touch-screen sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: There's a reason why this case is $16 compared to the rest of the Defender series. The screen protector is awful. My fingers are hurting from all the tapping because the touch sensitivity is almost close to 0. I will be ordering a different defender case and returning this one.
customer_reviews.author: S and Q

customer_reviews.title: Firt Problem
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a problem with Otter Box in the past. This case is already falling apart, the rubber at least. The screen protector is gapped so junk gets in between my pine and the case. I’ve only had this product 4 months. All my other otter box cases lasted at least 10 months. I’m so frustrated. Buying a new case... maybe a different brand. This case model is not worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: ReederC14

customer_reviews.title: Could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the hope of a sturdy waterproof and dustproof case for my iPhone. The belt "holster" made it perfect for use with my backpack when hiking. The solid plastic parts fit perfectly and are secure. Unfortunately the flexible rubber outer piece fails to meet expectations. The flexible rubber outer casing quickly began to stretch out of shape at the corners of the phone case. The charging port on the phone is covered by part of that flexible rubber. Opening that port cover and closing it to charge the phone is what likely contributes to the issue. The flexible rubber continues to stretch over time, most noticeably in the area of the port cover and adjoining corners.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Not made for new iPhone SE 2020!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and noticed that the opening for the Apple logo in the back is not in the right spot. It just shows the color of your phone there, which looks REALLY DUMB! I just paid $50 for this case and it doesn’t even fit right, not worth the money at all. I’ve never written a review on here, or anywhere, until now, THIS made me mad!!! Disappointed in Otterbox : (
customer_reviews.author: summertimerocks543222

customer_reviews.title: Great case, small issue
customer_reviews.text: I love this case, I switched from a "life proof" case because no one could here me talk through the case. But that changed with the otter box. It feels great in my hand, people can hear me and it feels durable. Only con about this case is I've noticed I get dust under my screen. I've made sure everything is secure but it still happens. I know this case isn't waterproof but if you're like me and can't stand having dirt on your screen it's something to think about. Other than that it would get a 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Jevon Hofer

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for your phone
customer_reviews.text: Using this on a SE 2020 model iPhone. Fits very nice and feel it will protect it well. I was looking for a case that is waterproof but, since the phone is somewhat waterproof, I'm not that concerned. It comes in four parts. An inner hard plastic, two piece, to cradle the phone and a soft rubber outer cover that encases the entire package and fits very nicely together. All together it then fits into the holder that can be used to stand on edge to view or clip to your pants/belt. The color is a deep Teal which I do happen to like being my favorite color is Teal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Weir

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me.
customer_reviews.text: This would be good fo a series 7 or 8 but I bought it because it would fit a SE 2020. But the hole in the back of the case is designed for the earlier models and I decided I didn’t care for that so I returned. Is very bulky but looks like it would be good at protection. Also I didn’t want the plastic screen cover it has built in. Just not for me
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best protection for your iPhones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protection for iPhones (just pick right one for your model). We have had these for iPhone 5, 6 and 8 models and they all protect very well. Holster to affix to your belt is detachable and a plus. One quibble is that the small thin plastic section on front to allow finger print recognition is fragile and often fails requiring new fingerprint passcodes to be added. Despite hat. this one protects best and your phone will look as New Years hence, ( I do not own Androids but assume they make them and are as good. ). NOTHING is waterproof so base your decision on phone manufacturer's recommendations
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and level of protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and level of protection. I think its the same as the Defender Series OtterBox I purchased for my iPhone 5. When I traded my iPhone 5 recently, it looked brand new thanks for the OtterBox Defender case. I definitely wanted the same level of protection for my iPhone 8 as they're so expensive & fragile now. (Even if it feels like a small brick lol.) Love the Big Sur color too. I will always be a returning customer to the Defender Series.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but easy to use and protection guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Otterboxes across the iPhone and Samsung platforms for years. They are consistent in their ability to protect the device. This one is equally as protective. As always, the trade-off for protection is sacrificing the feel of the phone itself. Occasionally, I take the phone out to clean the case and the cracks and crevices and I’m a little amazed at the feel of the phone itself. PROS: Unequaled protection and peace of mind that your phone will survive drops. Easy to install and remove from the case. CONS: Screen protector fits loosely and takes some getting used to over a traditional screen protector. Case is a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: 3rd replacement case, but it does protect your phone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd otter box case I have purchased for my current phone. What triggered me in to buying a new one is that the back plastic was coming up- around the circle on the back and was getting caught on things and also just cosmetically did not look good. The case does do a great job protecting your phone but their warranty and customer service has declined (I've been buying otter box cases for years) and they no longer completely stand behind their product. If you drop your phone a lot I still would absolutely recommend this product, just know you will be buying more replacements.
customer_reviews.author: m5441500

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality from a trusted and respected company.
customer_reviews.text: I was a loyal otterbox user. The quality has diminished. The plastic on the case cant be cleaned well enough and peels after a few months. Weirdly it holds smells like whatever it’s been around it smells like. The biggest problem is the plastic that covers the home button/Touch ID doesn’t last long at all it becomes loose and makes your phone unable to read your thumb. After replacing it twice.. I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: KariAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: looks good, but no real protection
customer_reviews.text: I always hear great things about Otterbox Defender phone cases. Well, this one had a good price, so I was hesitant. I should have trusted my spidey sense. I used this case along with a tempered glass screen protector. I fall from the hand onto a floor (not cement) and the screen cracked. I didn't see how it fell, but it points to a corner hit as it was all shattered in one corner and spread from there. If you want a case to protect from scratches and looks good, you can get this, but don't expect it to help if you drop your phone.
customer_reviews.author: gary assassin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality- the screen doesn't fit snug to the face of the phone
customer_reviews.text: The screen cover doesn't sit tight against the screen of the phone making it difficult to work. I love the grippy sides and the pink real tree design on the back. But the screen cover is very annoying. I need to touch it several times before it works. This is too bad. In the past, I bought 3 Otterbox defenders for my iPhone 4 and was very satisfied with them. I just upgraded to the iPhone 8 and thought the quality of the iPhone defender would still be good but sadly it is not.
customer_reviews.author: melzy

customer_reviews.title: Peel the fingerprint cover and lose your waterproofing or buy a different case
customer_reviews.text: The plastic over the fingerprint reader just doesn't work. I tried setting the fingerprint scan (on my SE 2020) with and without it several times. No matter what I did my success rate in unlocking it was less than 1 in 20. Eventually, I just peeled it off. The fingerprint scanner works now, but the case is no longer waterproof. On the bright side, the impact resistance is as good as ever. I've dropped my phone from all manner of heights onto all manner of surfaces and my screen is as uncracked as the day I bought it. It's a great case if you abuse your phone mostly in dry places.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Jearlyn Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone case. This is my first Otter. Normally, I just buy something cheap, but grippy. I don't like the thin slick cases. This definitely has a good feel to it. I gave it four stars because it has a built in screen protector, and it makes it harder (less sensitive) when using the touch screen. Three stars for durability only because I've only had the case for a week. I'm very particular about my phone case so couldn't imagine gifting a phone case to anyone. Great item. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne K

customer_reviews.title: But within a week of having it on my phone the rubber started pealing i love the color and I got so many compliments on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always Purchased Outterbox’s for my phones as long as I can remember. But within a week of having it on my phone the rubber started pealing i love the color and I got so many compliments on it in the beginning. I feel like it should last longer then two weeks. I had my Outterbox’s in the past for over a year. I’m not sure if this is a fake or Outterbox is making cheaper products but I am so disappointed especially since it was $50. The plastic shell was still in tact but the rubber is just wearing away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad now you
customer_reviews.text: The only thing bad about this case is the finger print reader has a piece of plastic stuck to the outside and it is slowly getting peeled off instead of being one continuous piece from the screen protector it is just another piece that is stuck to the front of the case! So if you drag your finger across it or get a fingernail in there you’re cleaning it it slowly pills it off so I wouldn’t recommend this case just because of that issue it will eventually peel off! Other than that I think it’s a pretty darn good case!
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your phone from breaking
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Otterbox, as I got a new phone. The old one is about 4 years old and still looks and works great. The front surface is not scratched. You hardly know it is there. Because of surgery on my upper spine, my hands don't always work as they use to and I drop things more than most people, so I have to be very careful. This has really been useful in terms of keeping my phone in good shape. I drop it about once a week, and it still works fine, so I guess the OtterBox is doing it's job.
customer_reviews.author: BLH

customer_reviews.title: Apple emblem will not show on this phone case if you have the SE second edition.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a phone case for a iPhone SE (2020) what I received was a case for iPhone 7/8. Nowhere on the box does it mention iPhone SE second edition. I didn’t know at the time until I saw some YouTube videos that the logo Apple sign is in the middle for the new SE second edition this case has a hole in it to show the Apple emblem of the old model, which is higher up on the back of the phone Siri: not the new one very disappointed. I spoke to someone from Apple who confirms that if it doesn’t say specifically for the SE second addition to not use.
customer_reviews.author: vlb400

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for a week and it’s already stained in the edges, it’s like a sponge for dirt. I don’t know if it’s because of the lighter aqua color, also the holes for the speakers in the bottom don’t quite align and I am thinking I might have to cut the little door/flap where the charger conects because the rubber is so stiff I am afraid is pushing the cable and ruining the contact port. Other than all of that it looks like it will protect the phone, only reason I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Lpo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, but stick to black.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. I love the defender series. This color, however, will fade. I had it for 2 weeks, and kept it no where near harsh sunlight nor did it go through any abuse but if you consider setting your phone down on tables, perhaps when you're out and about, at work, restaurants, the gym, this will eventually show signs of dirt. I tried to remove the dirt marks but to no avail did it come off. Stick with black unless you want to have a case that shows dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Quinsay

customer_reviews.title: Saves from a broken phone
customer_reviews.text: I have used Otter Box phone and tablet cases for years now on a half-dozen or more phones and a few iPads. All I can say is the quality of these cases last for quite a while. This particular purchase was for my son's first phone. We purchased it about 8 months ago, and he has already told me a few times that the case saved his phone from breaking. He has had a few drops at home and at work. So far, it has protected his phone perfectly. Of course, it also depends on HOW it hits the ground, but overall, these cases are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox Defender is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The defender series is great and I’ve been using it on iPhone for several years now. It does add to the size of the phone and it’s not the “prettiest”case. But it protects the phone very well indeed and its vaunted drop protection may be all the more necessary for the newer iPhones that are coming out with glass shells. If it’s on sale I’d recommend buying two if you plan on keeping your phone for 3 or 4 years or longer. That way you can swap in the new one after 2 years when the case has become inevitably dinged up a bit. (At least your phone won’t be dinged up).
customer_reviews.author: Wf

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very good one ..BUT..the screen protector that is attached to the from piece is waste, it makes it hard for the screen to respond, had to touch hard couple of times..pull that thing off and use another screen protector, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Indian

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered this case for my son when he upgraded to the iphone 8. It was very durable, easy to use, and we love the otterbox brand. Unfortunately, he left his phone in an uber car and by the time he contacted the driver, the driver said he didn't see a phone in his back seat. Long story short, we had to have the phone black listed so whomever got the phone won't be able to activate it with any carrier and got an iphone 7 as a replacement and ordered the same exact case. Again, it was a perfect fit. hopefully won't have to order again but if I do, I know I can rely on this case.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dropped on concrete many times, sturdy case!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It was far better priced than at the retail store and is the exact same case! Love the color. Have had no trouble with it at all. Extremely study as I have dropped my phone on our concrete garage floor MANY times and have had no issues with the phone cracking or breaking.
customer_reviews.author: sdkc21

customer_reviews.title: Awesome protection
customer_reviews.text: This case is like a tank; it is definitely bulky, converting the sleek, smooth iPhone into a chunky rubberized block reminiscent of some children's toys. That said, I've dropped my phone many times, including once from three stories onto concrete. Phone was fine. After shattering the screen on my iPhone 6 (without a case), the bulkiness seems a fair compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz D.

customer_reviews.title: Otters are the best
customer_reviews.text: Picked up this protector for my son's new phone. This is his first phone, and we wanted some extra protection for Mr. Butter Fingers. It paid for itself in the first week of use. He must have dropped his phone at least a dozen times. The Otter Box protected brilliantly. You will pay more for these and they may be a bit thicker than others. However, if you are serious about protecting your phone, there is no better alternative. The color options are great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Natale

customer_reviews.title: Loved All 3 of my Defenders. Only Gripe? Too Bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Loved all 3 of my Defenders (iPhone 4, 5s and now 8). Only suggestion; Make them more slender. I had a LifeProof, that began losing it’s rubberized coating after only 3 months. Oops! No longer waterproof! The only advantage it has over OtterBox’s Defender. Anyway. LifeProof is far more slender, but after a year I never had, nor worried about structural trauma or damage. Skinny it up guys. No need for the bulk.
customer_reviews.author: SD Cleveland

customer_reviews.title: Love the case, hate the plastic screen shield
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and feel of this case. It seems to offer great protection for my phone - it was last time I had the Defender case. The part that goes around the edges is sturdy and thick - like bumpers! I'm fairly clumsy and drop my phone a lot so the case gives me piece of mind. The problem? I am going to have to try to figure out how to take the plastic part off that protects the shield. This makes it much harder to use my screen and I already have a glass protector thing on it anyway so it's kind of redundant.
customer_reviews.author: Lolaloo

customer_reviews.title: Annoying!!!
customer_reviews.text: I HATED this case!!! After 3 days of struggling to type anything because of that stupid film is that’s CONNECTED to the case! I finally just took it off. What a fricken waste of money. It causes a lag in pressing any buttons. I wasn’t able to use my fingerprint access and sometimes I couldn’t even answer the phone. SO annoying! The rest of the case was very well made and sturdy. BUT that stupid film/glass type front made this case a big zero for me! I would NOT order it again and I would NOT recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Real protection.
customer_reviews.text: Serious protection. I have dropped an iPhone in one of these from waist height onto asphalt with no damage. It bounced. It will double the size of your svelte phone, but I don’t care for the protection. I have become frustrated by the FP reader and turned it off. Rubber case is very grippy and won’t slide through clothing well so I stopped using the holster for the most part. Into a pocket works fine. I don’t like having something so large on my belt. Interferes with a seatbelt.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Scratches easily and collects dust behind the screen protector.
customer_reviews.text: This case is useless if you're trying to keep dust and debris from getting into your speakers and charging port, the screen is made of cheap plastic that doesn't stand up to any scratching. I have to constantly remove the case and clean the dust away behind it so I can see and I cannot use my thumb print reader because of buildup behind the screen protector. It's very good at protecting the phone from drops and scratches but I have had the case for a couple weeks and just had to order a new life proof case because this one isn't half as good as the LifeProof case that lasted me a year.
customer_reviews.author: david munson

customer_reviews.title: These are indestructable. Finger print reader sometimes doesn't allow phone to log in.
customer_reviews.text: I had the same case for many years before screen protector got scratched and plastic around that cracked. Very durable. Same problem as previous case, The material covering the fingerprint log in sometimes distorts print and eventually will rip and no longer work. I had to peel last case back in that area to get fingerprint verification to work. Never damaged a phone or cracked a screen with this case , a lot of drops from high and low. I recommend for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever!
customer_reviews.text: Not a thing to dislike about this case. This is the third phone and third Defender case I’ve had. My phones were in perfect condition when I purchased a new one. This box went on a new iPhone 7s. My old iPhone 7 was in such good shape that when I sent it in for trade, I got the full $110! I cannot say enough good things about these cases. I’ve dropped iPhones down staircases at school and NEVER had any problems with the Defender case. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Seems Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: This product is as described. I am not a huge fan of the front film casing that goes over the screen. It often has difficulty registering my touch and reading my fingerprint. It is a relatively small annoyance in order to protect my phone, but not something that I think I will want to deal with long-term. However, my phone is very easy to hold with this case and I have dropped it a few times without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa LoCoco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection
customer_reviews.text: I had to replace my phone and needed to order a new Otterbox. I love the security I have when I encase my phone in the Otterbox. I occasionally drop my phone and this case protects it so well. I did notice two improvements on the design. First the openings for the charging, and the sound control opened to the back. This makes the case less susceptible to weakening at those points. I noticed this right away. My old case weakend and became loose and i did not like it. I also noticed that the finger button is protected better, it is stronger than my previous one. These changes only made a good product even better. Thank you !!!
customer_reviews.author: pansy

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty case, however,
customer_reviews.text: The case over all, I have not seen the rubber on the back of the case pealing off like some feedback I have read. So to help protect the rubber around the outside I carefully put a coat of Armer-all on the outer case. The main problem with this case is the screen protector! It only comes with a cheap plastic screen cover. The screen easy marks with dust, finger prints, and other blemsses. Their add clam's you can buy a glass cover, but it doesn't fit with the case.I am still looking for a Otter case with a glass screen that fits in a case for my I phone 8
customer_reviews.author: Mark Andrichyn

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: My son dropped his phone and broke his last case (a gorilla case that did perform well in protecting the phone) but he was complaining that his phone was too heavy and bulky with that case, so I decided to let him give this one a try. He really loves it and I think it will do a good job protecting the phone. I'll update if/when he drops his phone to see how this one does. Hoping it provides good protection with less bulk and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Mom

customer_reviews.title: Different Case Received Than Shown
customer_reviews.text: Not same case received as advertised in sell pictures. Pictures depict case with enclosed apple icon on back but received case with open apple emblem. Prefer for it to be closed which is why I ordered this case. It was given 3 stars due to false advertisement which is never cool, I like to know exactly what I’m getting and get exactly what I’m shown/told I’m getting. Other than that, I would give it 4 stars on performance of protecting phone, overall look, and usage of buttons. Bulky in hand but what can you expect when it’s a protectors case.
customer_reviews.author: Creamofsumyungai

customer_reviews.title: Saved my iPhone 7 at least 20 times!
customer_reviews.text: I am not very careful with my phones and bang in to stuff all the time while working. This otter box has saved my iPhone 7 at least 20 times! It has come off my belt several times, fallen out of my hands from various heights, hitting concrete, carpet, and tile floors and never cracked or dented my phone. I liked this case so much I bought one for my iPad. Worth the money, don't buy a cheap thin case for your expensive phone, it doesn't make sense!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love 💕
customer_reviews.text: I love that the case offers double protection. I do feel that repeatedly opening the charging port and volume port could cause the rubber to stretch out over time.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection, Sleek Design
customer_reviews.text: A lot slimmer than my last otter box defender that I had (iPhone 5), and the design of the case is more resilient to wear. The last Defender I had, the rubber casing started to become less taunt around the plastic shell, but so far I haven't experience that with this one. I am carless with my phone, yet this case has protected it form many drops and inaccurate tosses! Only downside: it does make the home button a little more resilient to pressure so you do have to press harder to activate it than normal.
customer_reviews.author: csufficool

customer_reviews.title: It’s an okay product
customer_reviews.text: The phone case is overall really great. I do feel like it would give your phone lots of protection in case you were to drop it. The only really really bad thing about it is the screen. The phone case comes with a really bad quality screen protector. Whenever I try to type or scroll through my phone it is kind of hard because the screen protector is really bad quality. It’s basically like putting one of those page sheet protectors over your phone. The screen protector is definitely not practical but the overall phone case I would say it’s pretty good in case you were to drop your phone.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best protection
customer_reviews.text: The otterbox defender is the best protection for your phone. If you work outdoors in extreme conditions you really need this. I work on different construction sites and end up dropping my phone in all sorts of gnarly situations and it always protects. If there was any drawback (other than it's a bit bulky but that's why it's super protected) it's that there aren't a lot of fun color options. Thankfully the wallet I have stuck to the back gives it a bit of color.
customer_reviews.author: Solaurie

customer_reviews.title: Phone savers
customer_reviews.text: I have used these cases on my last three phones and they are lifesavers. The rest of my family will not use them as they like the sleeker, trendier things that really don't accomplish anything. I have replaced many of their phones screens and the phones themselves but I have never had an issue with mine because of these cases. If you like spending 6-800.00 on phones by all means don't buy this product but if you want to protect your investment you need to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Rofshus

customer_reviews.title: Defender series iPhone case
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today, and put it on right away; my old Otterbox, a Commuter case, had cracked a little while ago and was probably not many drops from totally breaking. This case is a lot bulkier than my Commuter was. But I absolutely love it. It came nicely packaged in the original box. It takes a bit of work to put it on, but once it’s on, it feels 100% secure. I’m hard on my phone and this case will ensure that it’s well protected, I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Fits the new Iphone SE 2020 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Charging port Cover opens from the back up instead of from the front down. This ResultIng improvement is that the cover intact on all four sides.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: the best case for a kid
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenager, who drops the phone constantly. So far, so good, no cracks, the phone works fine. Very sturdy, durable case. I did remove the clear plastic screen protector that comes with this case. I bought a tempered glass screen protector and put that on my kid's phone, then put this case on top of it. No problems so far. this is a tough case. I have one on my phone. Good price too, tho limited color selection.
customer_reviews.author: Fly By Night

customer_reviews.title: To snug for iPhone SE.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this case, even though indicting it will accommodate the iPhone SE, is a little too small for it. This causes the case to bow and creates distance between the protector and screen in the middle making using the screen difficult and causes the case to be too tightly against the screen in the lower left corner making whatever function is there non functional. They need to make it to accommodate a slightly thicker phone.
customer_reviews.author: DS7

customer_reviews.title: Hole doesn't make sense.
customer_reviews.text: It might be a good case in terms of protection from drops but I hope they update the hole at the back because for SE 2020 it doesn't show the Apple logo. It is fine but it looks stupid having a hole, so why put a hole on it. My guess is just want to sell more of this case for SE 2020 without thinking that it would make sense for the logo to show. Another thing is that it is not dust free or debris free so you might find small stuff inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Glia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my daughters (iPhone 7 and iPhone 8 Plus). I removed the plastic cover though...it’s really not necessary in my opinion plus it makes the touchscreen a little less responsive. They like them and should hold up better than the ones they had.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Large screen protector scratch after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I have had many otterboxes over the years and think they are some of the best cases. This is probably my 4th or 5th defender case. I buy the one with the plastic screen protector built in....after barely 48 hrs there is a large scratch on the screen protector just from being in a purse with nothing sharp near it. Really disappointed because the plastic is obviously much cheaper or thinner now than it has been in the past. Just a bummer to now have scratches on my screen after handling it carefully that restrict how I can view it. : (
customer_reviews.author: Steven Sundquist

customer_reviews.title: Great Otterbox/Poor Plastic Screen Protection
customer_reviews.text: This otter box is similar to the one I purchased at AT&T. However, the plastic that covers the screen is flimsy and poorly made. I wouldn't think this case would be waterproof. Also, the plastic that covers the fingerprint button prevents the button from reading correctly. Many times, it cannot read my fingerprint and I have to enter my password to get it to open. If you are going to purchase this product, I would suggest spending extra money on glass to cover the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this ages ago and over felt it necessary to spread some love. I was out and about loving life on a raft in the middle of a shallow lake when a wind gust came through and blew the raft over that had my phone on it. After searching for 10 minutes I gave up. Went back 45 minutes later with goggles and found my phone. I grabbed my phone and was blown away that it was still playing music. So I have to tell you that it’s worth the money. Don’t cheap out on the case that’s protecting your pricey phone.
customer_reviews.author: timbo

customer_reviews.title: For the ultimate protection
customer_reviews.text: Extremely good protection. A little hard to get together. I did not like the plastic-like screen covering. It made it really hard to text or use the keypad. The screen wasn’t sensitive enough for me with this case—I felt like I had to push really hard. For my life, I don’t need this much protection so it felt a little too bulky. But if you need good protection go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good case; remove the screen protector
customer_reviews.text: Good phone cover for an iPhone 8. There is a significant air gap between the screen protector and the screen, so you must press hard to use the screen. It feels like using the touch-sensitive buttons that are still found on a soda dispenser. We followed instructions online to remove the screen protector and then scrape off the remaining rubber cement. We were happy using the cover once the protector was removed. The manufacturer should offer either a removable screen protector or none.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Otter Box Case I have gotten (the first one was for my iPhone SE 1st Gen). This one seems up to snuff just as my last one was so I'm sure there won't be a single problem with it. Add a tempered glass screen protector to it and you wont ever have to worry about damaging your phone if dropped again. The only reason I got the new iPhone SE 2020 was because I was a year overdue for an upgrade and I loved the first SE so I got the second.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Durable.  Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I had my first case like this for over two years. No issues with pushing links on the screen. I cleaned the entire case - 3 pieces regularly and bought this new one because the cover screen was scratched and made it difficult to read in sunlight This one is not working well with the touch screen. No gloves as I am in SoCal. Just my clean fingers and I am having difficulty selecting things like pressing play on a podcast. Not sure how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: 14er

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest product to put on, but my iPhone8 is definitely protected. I’ve already dropped the phone twice and neither it nor the case is the worse for wear. This is my second OtterBox. I had one for my iPhone5 and the phone looked perfect when I removed the case. After several years of use, the case was somewhat battered and the cover for the plug had come off. It was money well spent and I expect the same value and level of protection from my current OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: SD Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty but clip cover covers the camera
customer_reviews.text: Had to watch a video to be able to get my phone in. Then discovered the clip cover also covers the camera which makes it fairly useless for someone who wants to quickly be able to take photos. I will use the club cover when traveling or watching a movie. Overall I feel my phone has a titanium grade cover but wish the clip let me use the camera while it’s on. The amazon listing didn’t show pics of that cover.
customer_reviews.author: Picks n Pans

customer_reviews.title: A Must for any phone!
customer_reviews.text: Otter Boxes are a God send. They are strong, ease to attach and come in lots of colors. This is my 2nd phone and 2nd Otter Box (couldn't reuse my first one because the phone size was different-even though my Otter Box was still in excellent shape). The Otter Box has saved my phone on many occasions, as I have dropped it onto concrete and other surfaces multiple times...with no damage to my phone whatsoever. The built-in screen cover also makes it so you don't need to buy a separate screen protector for your phone.
customer_reviews.author: S. President

customer_reviews.title: Vastly improved
customer_reviews.text: Pro: A much better product than previous designs. The rubber guard around the plastic case is harder and less flimsy. The fit thus in more snug. Con: The button functions require more pressure to engage functions (volume, on/off and "home" button). Grip is more slick than the rubbery case of previous design. It is thus easier to drop from your hands but even a 5-6 foot drop will cause no harm to the IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: G. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Definitely pleased with quality and durability of the box. I have dropped tested the phone a couple of times without wanting to but thank God no damage sustained. The only downside is pulling the quick menu from the bottom of my screen, the protector is thick and takes a couple tries to get the quick menu up on the screen for flashlight, camera, calculator functions. Finger print has no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio Samir Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Attractive colors and perfect access to ports, buttons, camera, etc., make this a nice case. But what really earns it the 5 stars is the case's incredible protection. I work with infants and toddlers and my phone is literally dropped or thrown on a daily basis. As long as I have the Otterbox Defender case, my phone sails through such abuse without damage to the screen, buttons, or internally. It also protects the phone from dust, crumbs, sticky fingers, and heaven knows what's around.
customer_reviews.author: MyLikeIt

customer_reviews.title: Love the case
customer_reviews.text: Love the case, but not the built in screen protector. Within hours of receiving the case, I removed the screen protector and now I absolutely love it. Only thing to remember for those that remove the screen protector is that you will most likely need to put a spacer between the back of the phone and the back of the case to take up the void caused by missing screen protector. Otherwise the phone slides around inside the case.
customer_reviews.author: Erin C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in harsh conditions and it is very necessary to carry his phone by his side all day. The clip stays on and there is no need to worry about his phone falling off. The case has protected the phone everytime it has been dropped. The built in screen protector works ok, but sometimes it is hard to tap something on your screen. The screen protector keeps the dust out great though. Otter Box cases have yet to disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: KALH

customer_reviews.title: iPhone is completely encased and waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my iPhone 7 from accidental drops. Warning! I tried to remove the (I thought temporary) protective cover over the fingerprint scanner opening. Turns out it is meant to be permanent to protect from liquids. I wrinkled/ stretched it up and now the print scanner cannot read my thumbprint. The whole encased phone locks into a belt case. the belt clip also locks open to serve as a prop to allow it to set on a table at an upright angle while skyping. I have accidently dropped it several times (3 or 4 feet) without any damage to case or phone.
customer_reviews.author: Scaler

customer_reviews.title: As we were going down the road I'm like where's my phone
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats otter box! I set my phone on the bed of our truck cause I had my hands full. I forgot it and we took off. As we were going down the road I'm like where's my phone? Long story short, it fell off the bed and we ran over it 😳 But my phone was intact no cracked screen nothing looked like new!!! The case was beat up but not the phone! I even got a new case from otter box cause they're guaranteed for a yr sweet!
customer_reviews.author: teresa s

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this. Returned it. Easily distorted.
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Not worth all the hype on this brand. Difficult to assemble. With an outer cover that covers the screen I cannot see how a nice snug fit that doesn’t distort the image view is possible. The screen cover slightly bulges up. Additionally this product can very easily be damaged in shipping and handling causing it to not function as well as it theoretically does in the product images and videos. See pictures attached for more. Extremely poor packaging design.
customer_reviews.author: Jay V

customer_reviews.title: Great phone protector, HORRIBLE color.
customer_reviews.text: Who in their right mind is crazy enough to camouflage something I'm already an expert at misplacing?! Sadly, it was one of extremely few color choices for my phone. Protects it quite well, since I can't FIND it to drop it/etc. I really never wanted to, but ended up going a different maker for a neon green phone case I could FIND when I set it down. This is not my first Otterbox phone case, but sadly until they come out with some seriously bright colors, I can't use one.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T. Grout

product_meta.title: OtterBox DEFENDER SERIES Case for iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) and iPhone 8/7 (NOT PLUS) - Frustration Free Packaging - BLACK
product_meta.description: Size:Case| Color:BLACK| Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingWorry less while you’re on the job. Defender Series for iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) and iPhone 8/7 combines three ultra-tough layers to guard your device against serious drops, dirt, scrapes and bumps. The built-in screen film stops display scratches, plus the included holster gives you the quick draw on calls and texts. Defender Series works hard to protect your device.
feature_bullets: Compatible with iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) and iPhone 8/7 (NOT PLUS).  Images shown on iPhone 8. iPhone SE (2nd gen - 2020) does not show Apple logo.
Triple-layer defense: inner shell, outer cover and touchscreen protector
Belt-clip holster included that doubles as a kickstand for hands-free media viewing
Port covers keep out dust and debris
Includes OtterBox limited lifetime warranty (see website for details) and 100% authentic

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars20,657 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
